::Vamprah::

Vamprah smiled she needed strecht her legs too, she landed and before 
she ended land she chnged quickly at Robot mode, her arm was almost 
cured ... at last it wasn't blooding.

She smiled again and nswered him, "Lead  the way".


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer looks over Diamond as she left the room, frowning. If she 
> was an assassin, she'd fit in great, at least that's what he 
figured.
> 
> DevilDuer stands up. "I'm gonna stretch my legs too," he says to 
> Vamprah, "I can give you a tour if you'd like."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Diamond::
> > 
> > She looked at DevilDuer and then to Vamprah. "I have nothing to 
> > really offer this group. But I will stay here. Perhaps in time, 
you 
> > will find a possision for me here that is suited to my...talents."
> > 
> > She stood up and walked out of the lab. She hadn't been one to 
talk 
> > about things, but she had already told DevilDuer more than she 
> wanted 
> > to. She needed to get away from him for a bit and clear her head.
> > 
> > She walked down the hall and found the mess hall. She sat down at 
> an 
> > empty table. She stared at the opposite wall.  She thought about 
> how 
> > he mentioned reprogramming. The thought made her shudder. She had 
> > been programmed and reprogrammed so many times, she wondered how 
> much 
> > of her really was her and how much was the council's programs.
